items.label: Creating an App Registration in Entra ID

administration/emailtemplates.title: Email Templates
administration/emailtemplates.description: The Email Templates page lets administrators create email templates that can be used in Workflows. These templates can be used in Workflows for key processes like user onboarding, role transitions, and department reassignments.

administration/identityprovider.title: Identity Provider
administration/identityprovider.description: The Identity Provider Settings page is where you configure the connection between Adcyma and your external identity provider, such as Entra ID. This setup is essential for enabling Adcyma to communicate with your tenant.

administration/jobtitles.title: Job Titles
administration/jobtitles.description: The Job Titles page allows you to manage the list of job titles used across the system. You can easily add new titles or remove existing ones. These titles can be assigned to users and utilized in Workflows.

administration/managedusers.title: Managed Users
administration/managedusers.description: The Managed Users page displays all the users that are managed by Adcyma. Administrators can view details such as display names, usernames, job titles, and departments for each managed user.

administration/offices.title: Offices
administration/offices.description: The Offices page displays all the offices that are configured in Adcyma. Administrators can view details such as office names, locations, and associated information for each office.

administration/preferences.title: Preferences
administration/preferences.description: The Preferences page allows administrators to configure settings that define in what format Adcyma will create User Principal Name (UPN) and email addresses in your tenant.

administration/roletemplate.title: Role Templates
administration/roletemplate.description: The Role Templates page lets administrators create Roles that can be assigned to users through Workflows. These Roles help automate access management by allowing Workflows to grant the right groups at the right time for the right users.

administration/systemusers.title: System Users
administration/systemusers.description: The System Users page is where administrators can manage the internal user accounts within Adcyma. This page provides the functionality to create, edit, and delete system users, as well as assign roles to define their permissions and access levels.

dashboard.title: Using Your Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome to your dashboard! This guide will help you understand how to use the main features for managing employees.

userguides/setupentraappregistration.title: Creating an App Registration in Entra ID
userguides/setupentraappregistration.description: This guide explains how to create an App Registration in Entra ID, a necessary step for enabling Adcyma to communicate with Entra ID (and optionally Exchange).

userguides/signupadcyma.title: Adcyma Sign-Up Guide
userguides/signupadcyma.description: This guide will help you navigate the initial sign-up process, making sure youâ€™re set up in no time.
